Main_ChoamBranch.name: CHOAM branch
attributes: ::target_effects:: when the base exchange rate is at least ::value::

Main_ResearchCenter.name: Research Center
attributes: ::s_percent_value:: [Hegemony] gain from fulfilling a Spice Contract

Main_CouncilChamber.name: Council Chamber
attributes: ::us_percent:: of [CouncilVote]s and [Influence] spent on a resolution choice that failed are reimbursed as [Influence]

Main_MuseumOfUnboundArts.name: Museum of Unbound Arts
attributes: Removes limit on number of [!Masterpiece]s per [!Village]

Refinery.name: Refinery
attributes: Allows the deployment of a [!$my(Harvester)] to the nearest [SpiceArea]

SpiceSilos.name: Spice Silos
attributes: Ally [!Village]s in the Region and its neighbors gain ::target_effects:: (x::target_stacking_limit:: max)

Ally [!Village]s in the Region and its neighbors gain ::target_effects:: (x::target_stacking_limit:: max)
Ally [!Village]s in the Region and its neighbors gain ::target_effects:: (x::target_stacking_limit:: max)
Ally [!Village]s in the Region and its neighbors gain ::target_effects:: (x::target_stacking_limit:: max)
::target_effects:: to ally [V_Harvester]s in the Region and its neighbors (x::target_stacking_limit:: max)

SmugglingCenter.name: Trafficking Station
attributes: ::target_effects:: to neighboring Regions of any owner
Gain ::percent_value:: of neighboring Region's [Spice] production as [Solari]

MaintenanceCenter.name: Maintenance Center
attributes: ::target_effects:: in ally [!Village]s in the Region and its neighbors (x::target_stacking_limit:: max)

DewCollector.name: Dew Collector
attributes: ::s_value:: [Water] per level of wind strength in the Region

WindTrap.name: Windtrap
attributes: ::s_value:: [Water] per level of wind strength in the Region

ExperimentalAlloyFurnace.name: Experimental Furnace
attributes: ::target_effects:: in ally [!Village]s in the Region and its neighbors (x::target_stacking_limit:: max)

ExperimentalAlloyFurnace_Fremen.name: Experimental Furnace
attributes: ::target_effects:: in ally [!Village]s in the Region and its neighbors (x::target_stacking_limit:: max)

MissileBattery.name: Missile Battery
attributes: Automatically attacks enemy units within your territory

Airfield.name: Airfield
attributes: Ground Military Units can embark or disembark from [Shuttle]s within the [!Airfield]'s range
Allows placing the Rally Point within the [!Airfield]'s range

MilitaryFactory.name: Military Factory
attributes: Increases damage inflicted by military units by ::us_percent_value::

MilitaryFactory_Fremen.name: Military Factory
attributes: Increases damage inflicted by military units by ::us_percent_value::

NuclearSilo.name: Nuclear Silo
attributes: Allows for the preparation and launch of [NuclearHead]s

DataCenter.name: Data Center
attributes: ::s_value:: [Intel] production, when neighboring an enemy Region

ListeningPost.name: Listening Post
attributes: ::s_value:: [Influence] production, when neighboring an enemy Region

InvestmentOffice.name: Investment Office
attributes: Effects of [!SpecificityVillage] are applied ::value:: more time

MonitoringStation.name: Monitoring Station
attributes: Ally [!Village]s in the Region and its neighbors gain [MonitoringStation_Trait] (x::target_stacking_limit:: max): ::target_effects_list::

AtreidesFremenEmbassy.name: Concord Chamber
attributes: [Sietch]s in this region and its neighbors get ::target_effects:: (x::target_stacking_limit:: max)
Allied [Sietch]s in this region and its neighbors get ::target_effects:: (x1 max)

Masterpiece_Eco.name: Masterpiece
attributes: Destroying [!Masterpiece]s inflicts the loss of ::value:: [Authority] and ::value:: [Standing]

Masterpiece_Military.name: Masterpiece
attributes: Destroying [!Masterpiece]s inflicts the loss of ::value:: [Authority] and ::value:: [Standing]

Masterpiece_StateCraft.name: Masterpiece
attributes: Destroying [!Masterpiece]s inflicts the loss of ::value:: [Authority] and ::value:: [Standing]

NeuralNode.name: Neural Node
attributes: Can only be built in [!Village]s where exactly ::value:: neighbor is connected directly to the [Vernius_ConnectedVillage]

ContrabandCache.name: Contraband Caches
attributes: Stores ::percent_value:: of the [!Village]'s [Spice] production, up to ::value(UWHQ_StolenProd_MaxStock)::

HiddenExplosives.name: Hidden Explosives
attributes: [!HiddenExplosives] are removed when [Smugglers] units attack the [!Village]

LocalGang.name: Local Gang
attributes: [!LocalGang] is removed when [Smugglers] units attack the [!Village]

MBLaunderingNetwork.name: Laundering Network
attributes: ::target_effects:: per level of this main base's biggest completed [Economy] district

MBHiddenExplosives.name: Hidden Explosives
attributes: The Main Base cannot attack for a day upon ally [ArmySiege]

MBBeaconNetwork.name: Beacon Network
attributes: Ally Military Units in [::UWHQ_host_faction::-adjective] territory gain ::target_effects::

MBWeaponDealers.name: Weapon Dealers
attributes: ::target_effects:: per level of this main base's biggest completed [Military] district

MBSchemeLodge.name: Scheme Lodge
attributes: [::UWHQ_host_faction::-longname] gain access to Smuggler Contraband Offers
Gain ::value:: [Intel] when [::UWHQ_host_faction::-longname] finishes a Contraband Offer

MBActivistHeadquarters.name: Activist Headquarters
attributes: ::target_effects:: per level of this main base's biggest completed [Statecraft] district

SIDesertTrainingCenters.name: Desert Training Centers
attributes: Every [Sietch] and every allied or neutral [!Village] gains ::target_effects_list::

SIFremenAnalyst.name: Desert Analysts

Masterpiece.name: Masterpiece
attributes: Destroying [!Masterpiece]s inflicts the loss of ::value:: [Authority] and ::value:: [Standing]
